alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 22 at 2:14AM PDT until October 23 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Northern Elko total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt up to 10 inches Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 11 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
